page.title: 05Manningtree Comprehensive
page.content: The school was opened in 1937, the sports hall was opened in 1977 and the 25 metre swimming pool, built as a project between the school and the community was opened for schools use in 1979 and for community club and group use in 1980. This year 1985 a new canteen has been built. The school has 700 pupils and 39 staff. A typical school day is as follows:_ 8.55 bell for movement to form rooms. 9.00 pupils to be in the form room for registration. 9.10 assembly or form tutor period. 9.25 first lesson commences. There are eight periods of 35 minutes each during the day with a break mid morning at 10.35 to 10.50. The lunch break is from 12.00 to 13.10. Afternoon school finishes at 15.40. By E.Dew and S.Jones, both 12years
